MAN.TITLE: xbasc
MAN.SHORT_DESCRIPTION: clear a graphics window and erase the associated recorded graphics

DESCRIPTION.P: Without any argument, this function clears the current graphics window and erases the recorded graphics. Otherwise it clears the graphics windows whose numbers are included in the vector window-id, and erases the corresponding recorded graphics. For example xbasc(1:3) clears windows 1, 2 and 3 and erases the corresponding recorded graphics. If one of the windows does not exist, then it is automatically created.
With the new graphic mode prefer clf to xbasc
